foreignData.name: Entdecker der Reiche
foreignData.text:
Die Entdecker der Reiche kommen mit X +1/+1-Marken ins Spiel, wobei X gleich der Gesamtanzahl an Karten auf den Händen aller Spieler ist.
{2}{G}, entferne eine +1/+1-Marke von den Entdeckern der Reiche: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Länderkarte, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische danach.

foreignData.name: Rastreadores de terrenos
foreignData.text:
Los Rastreadores de terrenos entran con X contadores +1/+1 sobre ellos, donde X es la cantidad total de cartas que haya en las manos de todos los jugadores.
{2}{G}, remover un contador +1/+1 de los Rastreadores de terrenos: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra, muéstrala, ponla en tu mano y luego baraja.

foreignData.name: Chercheurs de royaume
foreignData.text:
Les Chercheurs de royaume arrivent avec X marqueurs +1/+1 sur eux, X étant le nombre total de cartes dans les mains de tous les joueurs.
{2}{G}, retirez un marqueur +1/+1 des Chercheurs de royaume : Cherchez une carte de terrain dans votre bibliothèque, révélez-la, mettez-la dans votre main puis mélangez.

foreignData.name: Cercatori di Reami
foreignData.text:
I Cercatori di Reami entrano con X segnalini +1/+1, dove X è il numero totale di carte nelle mani di tutti i giocatori.
{2}{G}, Rimuovi un segnalino +1/+1 dai Cercatori di Reami: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra, rivelala, aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola.

foreignData.name: 領域の探求者
foreignData.text:
領域の探求者は、＋１/＋１カウンターＸ個が置かれた状態で戦場に出る。Ｘは、すべてのプレイヤーの手札にあるカードの総数に等しい。
{2}{G}, 領域の探求者の上から＋１/＋１カウンター１個を取り除く：あなたのライブラリーから土地・カード１枚を探し、公開し、あなたの手札に加える。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・スカウト

mainBoard.name: Realm Seekers
mainBoard.originalText:
Realm Seekers enters with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total number of cards in all players' hands.
{2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Realm Seekers: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

rulings.text: If Realm Seekers enters the battlefield directly from a player's hand without being cast, it counts itself when determining the value of X.

The value of X is determined as Realm Seekers enters the battlefield. Players can cast spells and activate abilities while Realm Seekers is on the stack to remove cards from their hands if they wish, and this will result in fewer counters being placed on Realm Seekers as it enters the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Explore
mainBoard.originalText:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Explore's effect allows you to play an additional land during your main phase. Doing so follows the normal timing rules for playing lands. In particular, you don't get to play a land as Explore resolves; Explore fully resolves first and you draw a card, perhaps a land you'll play later.
If you somehow manage to cast Explore when it's not your turn, you'll draw a card when it resolves, but you won't be able to play a land that turn.
The effects of multiple Explores in the same turn are cumulative. They're also cumulative with other effects that let you play additional lands, such as the one from Urban Evolution.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Ainok Guide
mainBoard.originalText:
When Ainok Guide enters, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Ainok Guide.
• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

rulings.text: If a mode requires a target and there are no legal targets available, that mode can't be chosen. You must choose another mode if able.

You choose which mode you're using as you put the ability on the stack, after the creature has entered the battlefield. Once you've chosen a mode, you can't change that mode even if the creature leaves the battlefield in response to that ability.

mainBoard.text:
When this creature enters, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、その前者は＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。その前者はその後者に、その前者のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。

mainBoard.name: Clear Shot
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

rulings.text: As Clear Shot tries to resolve, if either creature is an illegal target, the creature you control won't deal damage. If the creature you control is a legal target but the other creature isn't, your creature will still get +1/+1.
You can't cast Clear Shot unless you choose a creature you control and a creature you don't control as targets.

mainBoard.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

mainBoard.name: Ghirapur Guide
mainBoard.originalText: {2}{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

rulings.text: Once a creature with power 2 or less has blocked a creature, activating Ghirapur Guide's ability won't change or undo that block.
Once a creature with power 3 or greater has blocked the target creature, changing the power of the blocking creature won't change or undo that block.

mainBoard.text: {2}{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

mainBoard.name: Tireless Provisioner
mainBoard.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a Food token or a Treasure token. (Food is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life." Treasure is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

rulings.text: Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
You can't sacrifice a Food to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability.

mainBoard.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a Food token or a Treasure token. (Food is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life." Treasure is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
